original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kammakārassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena kammakārassa ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kammakāro evaṁ cintayati ‘bhatako ahaṁ imāya nāvāya kammaṁ karomi,
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kammakāraḥ evam cintayati bhatakaḥ aham imāya nāvāya kammam karomi

original: imāyāhaṁ nāvāya vāhasā bhattavetanaṁ labhāmi, na me pamādo karaṇīyo, appamādena me
analyzed: imāya aham nāvāya vāhasā bhatta vetanam labhāmi na me pamādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ appamādena me

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena evaṁ cintayitabbaṁ ‘imaṁ kho ahaṁ cātumahābhūtikaṁ
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena evam cintayitabbam imam khalu aham cātumahābhūtika

original: kāyaṁ sammasanto satataṁ samitaṁ appamatto upaṭṭhitassati sato sampajāno samāhito
analyzed: kāyam sammasantaḥ satatam samitam appamattaḥ upaṭṭhita sati sataḥ sampajāno samāhitaḥ
ekagga cittaḥ jāti jarā byādhi maraṇa soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsehi parimuccissāmi iti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kammakārassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja kammakārassa ekam aṅgam
mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā
